UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: RYH: a minimal peptidic sequence obtained from beta-chain hemoglobin exhibiting an antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Catiau L, Traisnel J, Chihib NE, Le Flem G, Blanpain A, Melnyk O, Guillochon D, Nedjar-Arroume N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=73µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=73µM),Listeria innocua(MIC=73µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=85µM)
